requirements.summary: Remove admin access control from AdminPanel component, allowing all authenticated users to view and approve pending UTR verifications
acceptanceCriteria: AdminPanel.tsx no longer calls `initAdmin()` on mount.
AdminPanel.tsx no longer renders an 'Access denied. Admin only.' message under any condition.
On mount, the component immediately fetches and displays pending UTR verifications.
The Approve button on each row calls `approveUTR(targetPrincipal)` and removes the approved row from the list on success.

file_operations.description: Remove the `useInitAdmin` hook call and its associated loading/error state handling. Remove the conditional rendering that displays 'Access denied. Admin only.' error message. Update the component to immediately call `usePendingVerifications` on mount without waiting for admin initialization. Ensure the component proceeds directly to fetching and displaying pending UTR submissions for any authenticated user.

Remove or deprecate the `useInitAdmin` hook since admin initialization is no longer required. The hook can be left as a no-op for backward compatibility or removed entirely if no other components reference it. Verify that `usePendingVerifications` and `useApproveUTR` hooks remain unchanged and continue to work for all authenticated users.
